document_data.name: Tullamas Sales
document_data.mainbody: '''Tullamas Sales''' was a general goods store owned by [[Orloro Tullamas]] located in [[Tulmon]] along the [[Lake of Steam]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EotSS-p165-166">
document_data.Location: The shop was located on [[Shandlas Street]] in Tulmon.<ref name=EotSS-p165-166"/>
document_data.Activities: The shop carried a wide variety of dry goods including anything from "[[gloves]] to [[grain]] and [[candle]]s to [[cart]]s" according to the shop's owner.<ref name=EotSS-p165-166"/>
